text: wadhkr -ayha alrswl- esyan bani 'iisrayiyl lirabihim subhanah wteala wlnbyhm musaa ealayh alslam, wtbdylhm alqawl aldhy 'umiruu 'an yqwlwh hin qal allah lhm: askunuu qarya "byt almqds", wakuluu min thmarha whbwbha wnbatha 'ayn shitum wamataa shytm, wqwlu: hutt eanaa dhnwbna, wadkhuluu albab khadiein llh, naghfir lakum khtayakm, fala nwakhdhkm elyha, wasanazid almuhsinin min khayray aldunya walakhrt
